title: Digital Catalogue
description_long: A digital guide built for an art exhibition, featuring the famous Japanese artist Yayoi Kusama.
project_goal: Buildinng a digital guide for an art exhibition. Due to COVID-19 this was an alternative for visiting the exhibition in person. Although the digital guide would never replace visiting in person, it was a good starting point to look through for potential future visitors.
